metadata.synopsis: a drow commander marshalls a raiding party of goblins as they prepare to set out on a raid

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: When we reach the grove, you charge only on my command.
0.context: NodeContext: Projecting her voice as she talks to a gathering of goblin raiders, preparing to set out on a raid

2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
2.context: NodeContext: Projecting her voice as she talks to a gathering of goblin raiders, preparing to set out on a raid

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.context: NodeContext: Projecting her voice as she talks to a gathering of goblin raiders, preparing to set out on a raid. This is her final word - a war cry of sorts though the battle has not yet begun
